text: Paul Stendel (October 3, 1879 - August 12, 1942) was an American gymnast. He competed in four events at the 1904 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1879 births Category:1942 deaths Category:American male artistic gymnasts Category:Olympic gymnasts of the United States Category:Gymnasts at the 1904 Summer Olympics Category:Gymnasts from Berlin
title: Paul Stendel
